data.title: When and where to watch FC Barcelona v Olympique Lyon
data.meta_description: Our viewing guide to this weekend's UEFA Women's Champions League Final
data.text:
There's a huge game coming up this weekend in Bilbao, and while thousands of Barça fans will be packing San Mamés to watch the game, many, many more will be following the action on TV around the world

We'll be providing full coverage on our official app, while you can watch the game on DAZN and on its YouTube channel anywhere in the world apart from China, the Middle East and North Africa. Some local broadcasters are also showing the game. We have all the details below.

* Note that we only cite here the channels that hold the rights to show the game, but in some cases they may have opted to transfer the rights to the final to somebody else. Always check local TV listings to be sure.

Social networks

And let's not forget the complete coverage available on our official social networks:

English: @fcbarcelona & www.fcbarcelona.com

Catalan: @fcbarcelona_cat & www.fcbarcelona.cat

Spanish: @fcbarcelona_es & www.fcbarcelona.es

French: @fcbarcelona_fra & www.fcbarcelona.fr

Portuguese: @fcbarcelona_br

Arabic: @fcbarcelona_ara

Turkish: @fcbarcelona_tr

Chinese: fcbarcelona.cn

Japanese: @fcbarcelona_jp & www.fcbarcelona.jp

Indonesian: @fcbarcelona_id
